channel.title: Xuan on Xuan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Xuan on Xuan's blog

item.description: I’m Xuan, welcome to my blog! In my spare time, I like to coding, games, travelling, music and video!
If you know about computer vision and are interested in my project, you can view my project homepage, or send me an email

Biography I am a research assistant in CUHK (SZ). I am studyingComputational photography. Before that, I have worked in Westlake University as RA, studying Video Snapshot Compressive Imaging. In 2022, I received my master degree in the Sichuan University (Project 985 in China), supervised by Pro. Wei LI, studying deep learning, image/ video object detection and image video processing. Skills: Pytorch, Python, Matlab, Protus, AutoCAD, PS, PR, Procreat Education ðŸ’» Research Assistant in CUHK (SZ), Sep.

Project Research on Computational photography â€¢ Based on the characteristics of images and system, an algorithm framework for video denoising is developed. â€¢ Learned ISP processing, camera system, HDR fusion and noise calibration. Research on Video Snapshot Compressive Imaging â€¢ Utilized PnP framework, which combined deep learning denoising method with traditional optimization method. â€¢ Applied the self-supervised denoising method in the PnP framework to achieve a self-supervised video snapshot compressive imaging.

Publication Zhu, X., Liang, B., Fu, D., Huang, G., Yang, F., Li, W.: Airport Small Object Detection Based on Feature Enhancement. IET Image Process. 16, 2863â€“2874 (2022). (CCF-C) The second paper is revised. (First Author) Hai Jiang, Xuan Zhu, Ren Yang, Yutong Hao, Fengzhu Zou, Fang Lin and Songchen Han. R2RNet: Low-light. Image Enhancement via Real-low to Real-normal Network. arXiv preprint arXiv: 2106.14501, 2021. Fan Yang, Xiangtong Wang, Xuan Zhu, Binbin Liang, Wei Li.
